common.no_search_results_description: We couldn't find any results for your search

trunks.title: Trunk routing rules
trunks.title_tooltip: Define the routing rules for outbound calls
trunks.confirm_delete_trunk_message: Are you sure you want to delete the trunk routing rule
trunks.choose_the_destination_instance: Choose the nethvoice destination instance where you want to create the trunk
trunks.no_trunks_description: Start by adding a rule to route calls based on number prefixes
trunks.configure_trunk_description: Create a new rule to route calls based on a number prefix (Root)
trunks.root_helper: Enter the number prefix that triggers this rule
trunks.root_invalid_alphanumeric_format: The root must be alphanumeric (letters and numbers only)
trunks.root_already_exists: A trunk with this root name already exists

settings.title: Settings
settings.fqdn_helper: FQDN of the instance. Must be a valid domain name
settings.address_helper: IPv4 address expected to receive VoIP traffic
settings.public_address_helper: Public IPV4 address expected to receive VoIP traffic, in case of NAT

warning.different_ip_message: In order for the devices in the PBX local network to work correctly, the 'hairpin NAT' function, also known as NAT reflection / NAT hairpining / NAT on a stick / loopback NAT, must be enabled on the firewall (more precisely on the device that manages the NAT of the public IP).
